content:
Perfect—keep it simple, warm, and appreciative. Something like:  

> **Angela, this really means a lot—thank you.** 🙌 The last few days have been a whirlwind, and I’m grateful to have people like you in my corner. Excited to see where this all goes!  

No need to overcomplicate it. Just **acknowledge her support, express gratitude, and keep the momentum positive.** 🚀
